articles.author: Noel Chomyn
articles.title: Liverpool Reportedly Braced for Second Saudi Bid for Mohamed Salah - The Liverpool Offside
articles.description: The Saudi Pro League and PIF are negotiating for the player’s transfer on behalf of Al-Ittihad and could return with a £175-200M offer.
articles.content: Having seen a bid of £100M that could rise to £150M with add-ons rejected, Liverpool are expecting the Saudi Pro League to return with an even larger offer to test the Reds resolve to keep Mohamed Sa… [+1594 chars]
